mapper.sql: QSTN_ID, SUBJ_SCTN_ID, QSTN_TYPE_ID, QSTN_FROM_TYPE_ID, QSTN_TITLE, QSTN_INPUT_TIME, QSTN_PICTEXT, QSTN_NUM , QSTN_CODE, qstn_level
mapper.select: select qstn.QSTN_ID, QSTN_TITLE, QSTN_INPUT_TIME, qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID, qstn.QSTN_FROM_TYPE_ID, QSTN_CODE, QSTN_PICTEXT, QSTN_NUM, qstn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID from question qstn left join study_course_question cq on cq.qstn_id = qstn.qstn_id left join study_course crse on crse.crse_id = cq.crse_id where crse.crse_id = #{crseId} and qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID = #{type} and cq.crse_qstn_flag = #{flag}

select QSTN_ID, QSTN_TITLE, QSTN_INPUT_TIME, qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID, qstn.QSTN_FROM_TYPE_ID, QSTN_CODE, QSTN_PICTEXT, QSTN_NUM, qstn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID ,qttype.QSTN_TYPE_NAME , qtfrom.QSTN_FROM_TYPE_CODE , sctn.SUBJ_SCTN_TITLE ,unit.SUBJ_UNIT_TITLE, subj.SUBJ_TITLE, qstn_level FROM question qstn left JOIN question_type qttype on qttype.QSTN_TYPE_ID = qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN qstn_from_type qtfrom on qtfrom.QSTN_FROM_TYPE_ID = qstn.QSTN_FROM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN subj_section sctn on sctn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID = qstn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID LEFT JOIN subj_unit unit on sctn.SUBJ_UNIT_ID = unit.SUBJ_UNIT_ID LEFT JOIN subject_course subj on subj.SUBJ_ID = unit.SUBJ_ID where qstn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID = #{subjSctnId}

select * from question qstn where qstn_type_id='4' AND qstn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID in ( select tpd.SUBJ_SCTN_ID from test_plan_detailed tpd LEFT JOIN test_plan tp on tpd.TP_ID = tp.TP_ID where tp.TP_ID = #{value} and tpd.TP_DTD_TYPE = '5' ) order by qstn.QSTN_INPUT_TIME
